Rule.InvariantScript: If(And('MenuItemses screen'.Size = ScreenSize.Small, Or(newMode, editMode, itemSelected)), 0, 3)

Rules.InvariantScript: If(And('MenuItemses screen'.Size = ScreenSize.Small, Or(newMode, editMode, itemSelected)), false, true)
If(Or(deleteMode, And('MenuItemses screen'.Size = ScreenSize.Small, !newMode, !editMode, !itemSelected)), false, true)
ResetForm(Form1); UpdateContext({ editMode: false, newMode: false });
UpdateContext({ CurrentItem: Self.LastSubmit, editMode: false, newMode: false })
Notify("Cannot save. Please check if there are errors in the form.", NotificationType.Error)
"Are you sure you want to delete this record?"

Remove([@MenuItemses], selectedRecord); If(IsEmpty(Errors([@MenuItemses], selectedRecord)), UpdateContext( { CurrentItem: First([@MenuItemses]), itemSelected: false, editMode: false, newMode: false, deleteMode: false }));
